content.5: The earth also is defiled under the inhabitants thereof; because they have transgressed the laws, changed the ordinance, broken the everlasting covenant.
content.6: Therefore hath the curse devoured the earth, and they that dwell therein are desolate: therefore the inhabitants of the earth are burned, and few men left.
content.7: The new wine mourneth, the vine languisheth, all the merryhearted do sigh.
content.8: The mirth of tabrets ceaseth, the noise of them that rejoice endeth, the joy of the harp ceaseth.
content.9: They shall not drink wine with a song; strong drink shall be bitter to them that drink it.
content.10: The city of confusion is broken down: every house is shut up, that no man may come in.
content.12: In the city is left desolation, and the gate is smitten with destruction.
